projects.title: Siteactivityindex.com

projects.title: Misc. Python
projects.paragraph: I've built a lot of Python applications. Some examples: Twitter bots, back-end structures in Flask & Django, Machine Learning models, web scrapers. Some of them are available at my Github (link below).
